readingMnemonic: This whole description is pretty emo. You came up with this whole emo <kanji>frost</kanji> idea because you are a <reading>shemo</reading> (しも). An emo who goes by she pronouns.
meaningMnemonic: <radical>Rain</radical> falls off a <radical>tree</radical> and lands in your <radical>eye</radical> where it turns to <kanji>frost</kanji>. It turns to frost because it’s super cold outside and your body is freezing. The rain that fell off the tree turns to frost as soon as it hits your eye.
